articles.title: It's a good correction for Paytm as well as for some of the other NBFCs, says Siddhartha Khemka - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Despite the adjustments, Khemka maintained a positive view on Paytm, lowering the target price to ₹1,025 but highlighting its substantial upside from a one-year perspective.

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: X begins rolling out Grok, its ‘rebellious’ chatbot, to subscribers - TechCrunch
articles.description: X is rolling out Grok, its take on AI-powered bots like ChatGPT and Google's Bard. Unlike other chatbots, it has a bit of a mean streak.
articles.content:
Grok, a ChatGPT competitor developed by xAI, Elon Musks AI startup, has officially launched on X, the site formerly known as Twitter.
